A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A terrible mess that ruins the entire franchise. I didn't think it was possible for one movie to completely destroy all the movies that came before it\, but this one proved it's possible. A complete and utter disappointment too wrapped up in politics and completely useless plot points. I refuse to see another new Star Wars movie if it's made by Disney\, and I'll pretend that the new trilogy doesn't exist. I refuse to let it ruin everything that was once great about this galaxy.
